          status = U_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_ERROR;
          return FALSE;

          status = U_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_ERROR;
          return FALSE;

      if (capacity < minimumCapacity) {
!         if (capacity > (INT32_MAX - 1) / 2) {            // integer overflow check
